titleStmt.title: Ardua Regni: or, XII. arduous doubts of great concernment to the Kingdome, requiring a full and speedy resolution : propounded to M. Speaker, and the House of Commons, touching some of their late proceedings against their own suspended, ejected members, and the impeached Lords.
titleStmt.author: Prynne, William, 1600-1669.

titleStmt.title: Ardua Regni: or, XII. arduous doubts of great concernment to the Kingdome, requiring a full and speedy resolution : propounded to M. Speaker, and the House of Commons, touching some of their late proceedings against their own suspended, ejected members, and the impeached Lords.
titleStmt.author: Prynne, William, 1600-1669.

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "Feb: 25", "1647"; the 8 in imprint date is crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
